symptoms.name: Diarrhea
symptoms.pattern: Can range from mild to severe; may be absent

symptoms.name: Gastroenteritis
symptoms.pattern: Inflammation of the stomach and intestinal lining

symptoms.name: Vomiting
symptoms.pattern: Can range from mild to severe

vital_signs.heart_rate: May be elevated in severe cases due to dehydration
vital_signs.blood_pressure: May be low in severe dehydration

physical_findings: Signs of dehydration (dry mucous membranes, decreased skin turgor)

lab_values.electrolytes: May show abnormalities due to dehydration

risk_factors: Consumption of contaminated food or water
Travel to areas with poor sanitation

required: Symptoms suggestive of intestinal protozoal infection (e.g., diarrhea, vomiting, abdominal cramps)
Identification of protozoa in stool sample
supportive: Abnormal lab values suggestive of infection
